5   package net.sourceforge.pmd.typeresolution.testdata;
6   
7   /**
8    * @since 6.3.0
9    */
10  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
11  public class ArrayVariableDeclaration {
12  
13      /* In the following declarations:
14       * * The VariableDeclarators of a should have type int[], b should be int[][], c should be String[], d should be String[][]
15       * * The types of the FieldDeclaration and LocalVariableDeclaration nodes are undefined
16       *
17       * See https://github.com/pmd/pmd/issues/910
18       */
19  
20      /*
21       FieldDeclaration
22       |+ Type
23       | + ReferenceType[@Array=true() and @ArrayDims=1]
24       |   + PrimitiveType
25       |
26       |+ VariableDeclarator
27       | + VariableDeclaratorId[@Image="a" and @Array=false() and ArrayDims=0 and typeIs(.)='int[].class']
28       |
29       |+ VariableDeclarator
30       | + VariableDeclaratorId[@Image="b" and @Array=true() and ArrayDims=1 and typeIs(.)='int[][].class']
31      */
32      public int[] a, b[];    // SUPPRESS CHECKSTYLE now
33      public String[] c, d[]; // SUPPRESS CHECKSTYLE now
34  
35  
36      public void testLocalVars() {
37          int[] a, b[];    // SUPPRESS CHECKSTYLE now
38          String[] c, d[]; // SUPPRESS CHECKSTYLE now
39      }
40  }
